instructions.name: swap_tob_v3_with_receiver
docs: Swap ToB with optional specified receiver
- For normal token swaps: sol_receiver should be None
- For swap to SOL with custom receiver: sol_receiver should be Some and acc_close_flag must be true

accounts.name: sol_receiver
docs: - None: normal swap or SOL stays with payer
- Some: SOL receiver when converting wSOL -> SOL

accounts.name: authority_pda
docs: Used for signing fee transfers from authority_pda (SOL) or wsol_sa (WSOL)

accounts.name: wsol_sa
docs: This is the authority_pda's associated token account for WSOL

errors.name: AmountsAndRoutesMustHaveTheSameLength
errors.msg: amounts and routes must have the same length

errors.name: TotalAmountsMustBeEqualToAmountIn
errors.msg: total_amounts must be equal to amount_in

errors.name: DexesAndWeightsMustHaveTheSameLength
errors.msg: dexes and weights must have the same length

errors.name: InvalidSanctumLstStateListData
errors.msg: Invalid sanctum lst state list data

errors.name: InvalidSanctumLstStateListIndex
errors.msg: Invalid sanctum lst state list index

errors.name: AmountOutMustBeGreaterThanZero
errors.msg: Amount out must be greater than 0

errors.name: ResultMustBeGreaterThanZero
errors.msg: Calculation result must be greater than zero

errors.name: TobWsolSaRequired
errors.msg: TOB mode with WSOL fees requires wsol_sa account

errors.name: UnexpectedSaTokenAccount
errors.msg: Unexpected SA token account in CPI

errors.name: SolReceiverMustBeSystemAccount
errors.msg: SOL receiver must be a system account

errors.name: SolReceiverRequiresAccCloseFlag
errors.msg: SOL receiver requires acc_close_flag to be true

errors.name: DestinationMustBeWsolForSolReceiver
errors.msg: Destination must be wSOL when sol_receiver is specified
